name: Algerie Aero Academy
about: Algerie Aero Academy is a premier flight training institution based in Algeria, dedicated to producing future airline captains. Our programs are meticulously designed to take students from aviation foundations to Commercial Pilot Licenses (CPL) with Instrument Ratings (IR) and Theoretical Airline Transport Pilot Licenses (ATPL), along with Multi-Crew-Coordination/Jet Oriented Training (MCC/JOC). We invest heavily in human resources, state-of-the-art facilities, and modern aircraft such as the DA-40NG and DA-42VI. Our instructors are professional aviators passionate about training, ensuring students meet or exceed expectations. Our training is certified by Algerian Civil Authorities (DACM) and conforms to AESA standards. With a focus on safety, quality, and success, Algerie Aero Academy provides a pleasant and efficient learning environment, preparing students for successful careers in aviation.
services:
["Mechanic's Helper
Theoretical Helicopter Pilot Training (PPLH and CPLH)
Airport Handling Agent and Special Vehicles Training
Airport Baggage Handler Training
Airport Ground Handling Agent Training"]
